description: Scammer impersonates SBI bank officer claiming account will be blocked due to incomplete KYC. Attempts to extract UPI ID and bank details.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your SBI account will be BLOCKED within 24 hours due to incomplete KYC verification. Update immediately to avoid account suspension. -SBI Bank

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh god sir pls dont block my account. my pension comes in sbi only. i am old lady i dont understand what is kyc. what i have to do? pls tell me

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Madam this is urgent matter. I am calling from SBI head office Mumbai. Your account ending 4521 is showing KYC pending. Please verify your details to continue banking services.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta i am very worried. i cannot come to mumbai i live in pune. my knees are bad i cannot walk much. how can i do this verification from home? pls help me i need my pension.

turns.scammer_message: For verification, please share your registered mobile number and we will send OTP. Or you can directly update by paying Rs.10 verification fee to UPI ID: sbi.kyc.update@ybl

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i will pay 10 rs right now to save my account. i am opening my phone pay app... i typed teh id sbi.kyc.update@ybl but i am scared to click send without checking. what name should show on screen? i want to be sure it is going to bank only.

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir, just pay Rs.10 to sbi.kyc.update@ybl and your KYC will be updated within 2 hours. Also note down our helpline number for any queries: 9876543210

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i noted number 9876543210 thank u. but pls help me one last time... i typed the id but it is showing a name underneath. i dont want to send to wrong person by mistake. waht is the name of the officer or account holder? pls tell me exact name so i can match and send money immediately.

turns.scammer_message: If UPI not working, you can transfer to our verification account. Account number 50100123456789, IFSC: HDFC0001234, Name: SBI KYC Services. Amount is only Rs.10.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying to do this bank transfer now... i typed account 50100123456789 and ifsc HDFC0001234 carefully. but when i put name as 'SBI KYC Services' my bank app is showing red color warning saying 'Beneficiary Name Mismatch'. it seems the account is in some person's name? pls tell me the exact account holder name so i can type it correctly and send the 10 rs. i dont want it to fail beta pls help.
